X-Wing 2nd Edition Quick Build Printer

This page allows you to choose quick builds by faction, ship type, or extension, then lays them out for easy printing. It uses the actual card images from FFG. Having pre-printed quick builds reduces the setup time when trying to play a quick game of X-Wing.

Instructions

Choose a faction, ship type, or extension then press the update button. Save or print using the browser's print command, choosing page size and layout matching the Print Options.

The approach for page layout is to generate a single pdf where each page is the same size and multiple builds are put on the same page if a simple cut will work. This is useful when using a printing service (e.g., Staples, FedEx) that supports simple cuts like "cut in half vertically, horizontally, or both". Examine the pdf to determine what page ranges should use what type of cuts. 11"x17" has a more efficient layout.
